example.eg: I love you.
example.egtrans: 我爱你。

example.eg: The letter "i" is the ninth in the alphabet.
example.egtrans: “I”是字母表上的第九个字母。

example.eg: How do we distinguish between I and not-I?
Turn to Chapter I in your books.
Charles I was executed in 1649.
For many people, Ronaldo would be first on a list of the world's greatest soccer players.  I liked the first song best.
example.egtrans: 对于许多人来说，罗纳尔多在世界上最伟大的足球运动员中位列第一。我最喜欢第一首歌。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 排名第一的, 位列第一的, 第一的, 首位的

example.eg: She was first in the spelling competition.  The team is currently first in the league.
example.egtrans: 她是拼写比赛中的第一名。这支球队是当前联赛中的冠军。

example.eg: We sat in the first row of seats.
example.egtrans: 我们坐在最前面一排。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 第一的，第一排的, 最前面的

example.eg: The first reason for doing this is to help other people.
example.egtrans: 这样做的首要原因是帮助他人。

example.eg: He walked through the door first, and everyone else followed.
example.egtrans: 他抢先走进门，其余人紧随其后。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 首先, 先于别人地, 抢先

example.eg: What we need to do first is find a place to stay.
example.egtrans: 我们首先要做的事就是找到一个住的地方。

example.eg: First, I would like to thank you all for coming.
example.egtrans: 首先，我想感谢各位的大驾光临。

example.eg: Chloe finished first out of 80 runners.
example.egtrans: 克洛伊在80名赛跑选手中位列第一。

dsense.name: first, 1st, the first, the 1st
dsense.guideword: invariable (in a series, list: 1st item, person)

example.eg: I like the first better than the second.
example.egtrans: 比起第二个，我更喜欢第一个。

example.eg: We don't get paid again until the first.
example.egtrans: 我们一号才会再发工资。

dsense.name: the first of, 1st, 1st of, the 1st, the 1st of
dsense.guideword: UK (first day of specified month) (一个月的第一天)

example.eg: In France, the first of May is a public holiday.
example.egtrans: 在法国，五月一号，是法定假日。

example.eg: Switch to first gear when going up steep hills.
example.egtrans: 爬陡坡时换到一档。

example.eg: She plays first clarinet in the orchestra.
example.egtrans: 她在管弦乐队担任单簧管首席。

example.eg: He didn't make it past first base.
example.egtrans: 他一垒都没过。

example.eg: I first came to New York when I was a little girl.
example.egtrans: 我初次来纽约时还是个小姑娘。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 第一次, 初次, 首次

example.eg: Lie to you? I'd kill my own mother first!
example.egtrans: 对你撒谎？我宁可把自己亲妈给杀了！

example.eg: She was a good worker from the first.
example.egtrans: 她从一开始工作就很认真。

example.eg: The composer intended the second violinists to contrast with the firsts.
example.egtrans: 作曲者意在让第二小提琴和第一小提琴形成反差。

example.eg: She's always the first in any competition.
example.egtrans: 任何竞赛她都总能得第一。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 第一名, 头名, 冠军

example.eg: He's on first.
example.egtrans: 他在一垒。

example.eg: He got a first from Cambridge.
We sell firsts at a slightly higher price than seconds.
example.egtrans: 我们的最好产品售价比次好的略高。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最好的产品, 一等品

example.eg: Queen Elizabeth the First was 25 years old when she came to the throne.
example.egtrans: 女王伊丽莎白一世登基时年仅25岁。

example.eg: Beethoven's First was written in C major.
example.egtrans: 贝多芬以C大调来编写第一交响曲。

dsense.name: as far as I am concerned, as far as I'm concerned

example.eg: As far as I'm concerned, that was the best film of the year.
example.egtrans: 我认为那是这一整年最好看的电影。

dsense.name: as far as I am concerned, as far as I'm concerned

example.eg: As far as I'm concerned, I never want to eat another fried alligator steak.
example.egtrans: 至于我，是再也不想吃炸鳄鱼肉排了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 就我而言, 对我来说, 至于我

example.eg: As far as I know, the bank approved the loan.  The boss is in his office, as far as I know.
example.egtrans: 据我所知，银行批准了那笔贷款。据我所知，老板在他的办公室里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 据我所知, 就我所知

example.eg: As I was saying before being interrupted, the lady of the house is not home.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正如我所说, 正如我说的

example.eg: Ooh, a slide! Bagsy go first!
Can I help you? asked the sales clerk.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有什么可以帮您的吗？, 需要帮忙吗？, 好的, 第一次世界大战

dsense.name: for all I know
dsense.guideword: (possibly, even though I do not know)

example.eg: I won't argue with you; for all I know, there may actually be little green men on Mars.
Agave nectar has a low G.I.
The G.I. is stationed overseas during the war.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 美国士兵, 美国大兵

example.eg: Store clerks often ask customers, "How can I help you?"

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我能为您做什么吗？，您需要什么？

example.eg: Why are you asking me if it's going to rain tomorrow? How should I know?
“I agree!” Tom said. “You're right!”
example.egtrans: “我同意！”汤姆说，“你是对的！”

example.eg: I'm from Poland, though I've lived in London for more than ten years now.
example.egtrans: 尽管现在我已经在伦敦居住超过10年之久了，不过我来自波兰。

example.eg: I know I'm late for lunch. I am going now!
example.egtrans: 我知道午餐要迟到了。我马上就离开！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我要走了, 我马上离开

example.eg: Do you need anything? - No, I'm good.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我能接受, 我觉得可以

example.eg: I'm happy to spend the holidays with my family this year.
example.egtrans: 我很高兴今年和我的家人一起过节。

example.eg: I am sorry, I made a mistake.
I am sorry to hear about your mother's accident.
example.egtrans: 听说你母亲出了事故，我很难过。

dsense.name: I am sorry for your loss

example.eg: I beg your pardon, I didn't realise my chair was on your coat.
I beg your pardon! I'm certainly not in my sixties!
I beg your pardon? I didn't quite catch that.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 请您再说一遍好吗？，您可以再说一遍吗？

example.eg: He is very intelligent, I believe.
I believe the class begins on Monday.
"Dad was mad at me for taking the car." "I bet!"
"This time next week we'll be on holiday." "I can't wait!"
example.egtrans: “下周的这个时候我们就放假了。”“我都等不及了！”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我都等不及了，我迫不及待

dsense.name: I daresay, I daresay that, I dare say, I dare say that

example.eg: I daresay you're hungry after your long walk.
There is no point asking me; I do not know.  I do not know the answer to that complicated math problem!
Ronald Jacobs, do you promise to love this woman for the rest of your days? I do.
"You can't go out dressed like that; you'll get cold." "I don't care."
example.egtrans: “你不能穿那个出门，会感冒的。”“我不在乎。”

example.eg: "Who's that woman talking to your brother?" "I don't know."
example.egtrans: “那个跟你哥哥聊天的女人是谁？”“我不知道。”

dsense.name: I don't mind
dsense.guideword: informal (I have no preference) (非正式用语)

example.eg: "We can go to the cinema or ten-pin bowling. What do you want to do?" "I don't mind."
example.egtrans: “我们可以去看电影也可以去打保龄球。你想做什么？”“我无所谓。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我无所谓，怎么都可以，随便

dsense.name: I don't mind
dsense.guideword: informal (I am not upset) (非正式用语)

example.eg: I don't mind if you sit beside me.
example.egtrans: 我不介意你坐我旁边。

example.eg: When Tom asked me if Sally was coming to the party I replied "I don't think so".

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我认为并非如此, 我不同意

example.eg: I've forgotten your name. Could you remind me?
example.egtrans: 我忘记你的名字了。你能提示我一下吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我忘了, 我不记得了

example.eg: Ah, I got it. Thanks for the explanation!
example.egtrans: 啊，我懂了。谢谢讲解！

dsense.name: I got it
dsense.guideword: US, slang (I have the matter in hand) (非正式用语)

example.eg: Don't worry about washing the dishes. I got it.
example.egtrans: 别担心洗碗的事情，交给我就好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我来，交给我，我来管，我来负责

dsense.name: I guess
dsense.guideword: informal: followed by clause (I suppose that) (非正式用语)

example.eg: I guess you're right.
example.egtrans: 我想你是对的。//既然我们无法反驳他一整天都呆在家里，我想我们只能相信他的话了。

example.eg: "Have you had enough to eat?" "I guess."
example.egtrans: “你吃饱了吗？”“我想是的。”

example.eg: This is not love! I hate you!
example.egtrans: 那才不是爱！我恨你！

example.eg: I have to go now, or I'll miss my train.  I don't want to go but I have to.
example.egtrans: 我必须走了，不然就要错过我的火车了。我不想去，不过没办法，我不得不去。

example.eg: There's no need to tell me that man's an idiot. I know!
example.egtrans: 我知道的那人是白痴，你不必向我解释！

example.eg: What a lovely dress! I like it.
I like you. You seem like such a nice person.

dsense.name: I look forward to hearing from you
dsense.guideword: written, slightly formal (application, request: signing off) (申请、请求：落款，书面)

example.eg: Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

dsense.name: I look forward to your reply
dsense.guideword: written, slightly formal (application, request: signing off)

example.eg: Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to your reply.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 期待您的回复, 期待收到您的答复

dsense.name: I love u, I love U

example.eg: See you for dinner tonight. I love u.
example.egtrans: 今晚晚餐见。我爱你。

dsense.name: I love you
dsense.guideword: (declaration of strong affection) (表达强烈的感情)

example.eg: I love you, Mom!
example.egtrans: 妈妈，我爱你！

dsense.name: I love you
dsense.guideword: (declaration of strong romantic feelings) (表达浪漫的爱情)

example.eg: I love you and I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
example.egtrans: 我爱你，想和你共度余生。

example.eg: I love you so much that I can't stand to be apart from you.
example.egtrans: 我如此爱你，所以我不能忍受与你分开。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我如此爱你, 我深爱着你

example.eg: How are you? I mean, have you recovered completely from your illness?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我的意思是, 我是说

example.eg: When I say I care about you, I mean it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我是认真的，我是说真的

example.eg: I miss you, my darling. Come home soon.
example.egtrans: 亲爱的，我想你。快点回家吧。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我想你, 我想念你, 我思念你

example.eg: John, I don't just love you, I need you!
example.egtrans: 约翰，我不只是爱你，我还很依赖你！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我需要你, 我依赖你

example.eg: So, you agree with me? Then I rest my case.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我的话讲完了，无需多说

example.eg: I say, Jeeves! - that was a splendid party, was it not?
How can our company save money during this recession? I say we stop hiring and freeze salaries.
So, you don't like this office?  I see.  We'll try to get you moved as soon as possible.
example.egtrans: 所以你不喜欢这间办公室？我明白了。我们会尽快让你搬离的。

example.eg: "Is he coming with us?" "I think so, but let me call him to make sure."

dsense.name: I want you
dsense.guideword: informal (I am sexually attracted to you) (非正式用语，有性暗示)

example.eg: I want you. Let's leave this party and go back to my place.
I was wondering if you would like to go to the museum with me on Saturday.
"Abigail Smith, will you promise to love this man and be faithful?"  "I will."
example.egtrans: “阿比盖尔·史密斯，你愿意保证爱你眼前这个人并且忠诚于他么？”“我愿意。”

dsense.name: I will miss you, I'll miss you

example.eg: Goodbye, son. I'll miss you.
example.egtrans: 再见，儿子。我会想你的。

example.eg: I wish that we could talk about what's been bothering you.
example.egtrans: 我希望我们能谈谈一直以来困扰你的事情。

example.eg: Did I win the lottery? I wish!
example.egtrans: 我赢了彩票？做梦还差不多！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我还想呢，想得美，做梦呢

example.eg: I worship you and the ground you walk on!

dsense.name: I would like
dsense.guideword: polite (with object: I want) (一种礼貌的表达方式)

example.eg: I would like the coq au vin, please.
example.egtrans: 我想要酒焖鸡。

dsense.name: I would like
dsense.guideword: polite (I want) (一种礼貌的表达方式)

example.eg: I would like you to be more involved in the community website.
example.egtrans: 我希望你能更多地参与社区网站。

example.eg: Jessica thinks she's going to get the job, but I wouldn't bet on it!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我看没戏, 我看不一定

example.eg: I'd like to get married this year.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我来猜, [I would的缩略形式]

example.eg: I'd been to France before, but this was the first time I'd visited Paris.
"Would you like to go out for a drink?" "I'd love to."

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我愿意, 我非常乐意

example.eg: I'll eat dinner at 7:00 tonight.

dsense.name: "Well, I'll be damned!", also US: "Well, I'll be darned!"
dsense.guideword: potentially offensive, slang (surprise, disbelief) (表示惊讶)

example.eg: Well, I'll be damned; if it isn't my long-lost sister!

dsense.name: I'll be damned if, also US: I'll be darned if

example.eg: I'll be damned if I'm going to let you take our son!

dsense.name: I'll be seeing you, I'll be seeing you!, Be seeing you!

example.eg: I'm the best waiter in this restaurant.
example.egtrans: 我是这家餐厅中最棒的侍应生。

example.eg: I'm afraid I didn't do a very good job yesterday.
"Professor, did you have time to read my essay?" "No, I'm afraid not."

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很遗憾，不是这样, 恐怕不是这样

example.eg: "Do I really have to take the test?" "I'm afraid so. It's compulsory."
"I'm done!" the little boy shouted, and leaped out of his chair.
'How are you?' - 'I'm fine, thanks!'
example.egtrans: “你近来如何？”“我很好，谢谢！”

example.eg: 'Would you like something to eat or drink?' - 'No, thanks. I'm fine.'
example.egtrans: "你要吃一点或喝一点吗？"“不用，谢谢。我够了。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我够了, 我不需要了

example.eg: "How are you?" "I'm good, thanks."
example.egtrans: “你怎么样啊？”“我感觉不错，谢谢关心。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我觉得还好，我感觉不错

dsense.name: I'm good
dsense.guideword: slang (I have, have had enough) (非正式用语)

example.eg: "Would you like another slice of pizza?" "No thanks, I'm good."
example.egtrans: “你还要来一块儿披萨吗？”“不用，我够了，谢谢。”

example.eg: If you want to go to the baseball game, I'm in.
When her boss asked if she would handle the pile of paperwork, June replied, "I'm on it!"
I'm sorry for breaking your favorite lamp!
example.egtrans: 我很抱歉弄坏了你最喜欢的灯！

dsense.name: I'm sorry
dsense.guideword: informal (I offer my sympathy) (非正式用语，表示同情)

example.eg: I am sorry for your loss.
example.egtrans: 对于你痛失至亲，我很难过。

example.eg: I'm sorry for your loss; your father will be missed by all who knew him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 节哀顺变, 莫过于伤心

example.eg: I've eaten too much.  I've been working here for five years.
